titleStmt.title: Two intercepted letters from Sr. William Brereton to the Earle of Essex and M. Pym concerning the rebels affaires in the North : the originalls whereof were sent by an expresse to the Earle of Essex according to His Majesties direction this 8. of July, 1643.
titleStmt.author: Brereton, William, Sir, 1604-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed verbatim according to the originalls by Leonard Lichfield ...,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
